item.title: poorelon is the meme du jour.

item.description: JavaScript code that reads an OPML subscription list, and loops over all the feeds and only passes on the ones that are reachable and parseable. https://t.co/XHM0p94iWb
Disinformation Governance Board 'paused' after just 3 weeks. https://t.co/4nJZsJVlbS
@jessegrosjean @gwthompson @chriseidhof @WorkFlowy @checkvist_news https://t.co/AGI04B7K2e
@jeffjarvis Why aren't you retiring to the mountains? It's nice up here! (A little cold in the winter.)
YES â€” cut off the cash flow from us to Murdoch. https://t.co/HrFOF0PFc3
@jayrosen_nyu How about two highly respected New Yorker writers and Mitt Romney.
@jayrosen_nyu really well-respected reporters, for example from the new yorker. yes?
@gwthompson @jessegrosjean @chriseidhof @WorkFlowy @checkvist_news That's correct. Electric Drummer is the same outliner. Different package.
@jessegrosjean @gwthompson @chriseidhof @WorkFlowy @checkvist_news Good.
@Larry_Huppert Thanks. Sounds like Alexa (or Google Assistant) are not yet portable, which is a shame.

There's a new Mac outliner which is designed to interop with Drummer. Gotta love that. Everyone should use an outliner, imho, but no one seems to agree on how they should work. And there are so many things you want to plug into outliners, no one product can do them all.
All that is why you want to tie them all together to so you can use multiple tools to work on them, like PDF or GIF or RSS. The format is way too valuable to lock the user into a single editor.
And we're at a good point where there's lots of movement and no one is dominant.

BTW, to reporters who think Twitter is useless. Here's a case study. I wanted to learn about portable speakers with Alexa built in. So I asked about it here. https://t.co/sUuLcAARI1 Lots of info, great background for a purchase, then a report. https://t.co/CwmG1jb0ov
@jessegrosjean @chriseidhof @WorkFlowy @checkvist_news It would kind of make sense in the File menu. ;-) But it was added as an "experimental" feature, ie after the UI was more or less done. ;-)
Larry David FTX Commercial. https://t.co/Q3X2MtPrnI
